def format_tic_tac_toe_board(board, width):
    centered_board = [c.center(4) for c in board]
    rows = ['|'.join(centered_board[n:n + width]) for n in range(0, len(board), width)]
    formatted_board = ('\n' + '-' * (4 * width - 1) + '\n').join(rows)
    return formatted_board
